value.latex:
Soit $f \in C^2 (\Rr)$ telle que $\forall (x, y) \in \Rr^2 \, \, f (x + y)f (x-y)
\leq f (x)^2$.
Montrer que $\forall x \in \Rr \, \, f (x)f'' (x) \leq f' (x)^2$.
value.html: Soit \(f \in C^2 (\Rr)\) telle que \(\forall (x, y) \in \Rr^2 \, \, f (x + y)f (x-y) \leq f (x)^2\). Montrer que \(\forall x \in \Rr \, \, f (x)f'' (x) \leq f' (x)^2\).
